name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picture In Picture for Prime Video

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Picture-In-Picture chrome extension and enable PIP mode on all Amazon prime videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picture in Picture for Prime Video is a Chrome extension that allows you to watch Prime Video videos in a floating window, so you can continue to use your browser for other tasks. This is a great way to multitask, such as browsing the web, checking email, or working on a document, while still being able to watch your favorite shows. 

 

Key Features 

 

>> Watch Prime Video videos in a floating window 
>> Move the floating window to any location on your screen 
>> Play, pause, rewind, and fast forward videos in the floating window 
>> Control the volume of the video in the floating window 
>> Close the floating window at any time 

How to Use 

 

To use Picture in Picture for Prime Video, simply follow these steps: 

>> Install the extension 
>> Go to the Prime Video website and start playing a video. 
>> Click on the Picture in Picture icon in the toolbar. 
>> The video will now play in a floating window. 
>> You can move the floating window to any location on your screen.
